boardgame.name: Cerebria: The Inside World
세리브리아
boardgame.description: Cerebria is a dynamic, team-based, objective-driven area control game, where players play as Spirits, powerful entities representing Bliss or Gloom. These opposing forces - the two sides of human nature - struggle to control and shape the Inside World, the metaphorical representation of an evolving personality._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cerebria introduces a unique theme and numerous innovative mechanisms. The game is centered around the player-controlled Spirits, and the Emotion cards controlling Cerebria_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s areas, each with their own stats and abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Spirits can perform up to three actions on their turn. These include moving between Cerebria_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Realms and Frontiers, using the specific powers of the Realms, invoking and upgrading Emotion cards, removing opposing Emotions, and building Fortresses to consolidate their influence on certain areas. The Actions cost Willpower, gained primarily by absorbing from the Origin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Spheres in the middle of the board. Both Bliss and Gloom also have a rare shared team resource, Ambition, enabling them to use the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s most powerful effects._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The teams can score points either by accomplishing publicly known minor objectives (the Intentions), or completing their major objectives (the Aspirations), which change dynamically during the course of the game. Scoring Aspirations allows players to add Bliss and Gloom Fragments to the Identity, built in the middle of the board. These are key moments in the game: Cerebria_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s state is in constant flux, but the Fragments are permanent imprints of a game state during the scoring events._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The game is won by the side with more influence over the finished Identity, thus becoming the dominant force in Cerebria._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

*** PLEASE NOTE THIS IS NOT FOR THE CORE GAME, THIS IS FOR THE BUNDLE, CEREBRIA ORIGIN BOX PLEDGE LEVEL *** Contents: Kickstarter Edition of Cerebria Origin Box Pledge Level Board Game. Includes Cerebria base game, 2 custom-designed Emotion booklets, 8 x 55-60 mm (~2,4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) un-painted Spirit miniatures plus KS exclusive Balance (additional 3rd side to the game), 4 new types of strong emotions for balance (8 additional cards in all), Caprice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Reason joins the Forces of Balance (2 additional miniatures, 2 double sided player boards and upgraded tokens), spot uv highlighted interface board, and plastic tray insert sized for sleeved cards. And all other unlocked stretch goals. Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.
